description:
Ok, so this video seems to be out of order. Jasper and best friend AJ already have had a video aired with them having sex together, and here is Jasper just getting his dick sucked.
Well, when AJ and Jasper came in to do their scene, it was Halloween, and they basically wanted to get it done and head to the local festivities. I didn't really have time to talk with Jasper or take some nice photos.
Then the holidays rolled around, and I realized I hadn't had Jasper back to do some photos, and Jasper suggested he should do a video. I really hadn't budgeted for a full sex scene, so I suggested the Serviced video. Thankfully, he was game for it.
On the car ride to the studio, I finally got to know him a bit better. He's had a girlfriend for about 3 months, and she found out fingering his hole made him cum quick.
I said that sounded great and could I try that trick on him? He said sure and that it feels much better when he nuts.
So it is fun to watch his dick go from fairly hard to bone hard when I am fingering his prostate.
In fact, I made sure I was finger fucking him while he nutted.
This video may seem like a step backwards from what you have already seen him do, but it is a sensual Serviced video, and hey, it's Monday and it's more than a solo!
title: Bryan & Jasper - Serviced
